title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.8 - Local social services cooperation with department
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 300.8 - Local social services cooperation with department

State Regulations

Local social services officials shall cooperate with the
department in the discharge of its supervisory responsibilities, including the
making of reviews, studies and surveys of the operations of the social services
districts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
300.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
